item.title: How to Use Orcane's Forward Air
item.description: Orcane’s Fair is a bit like a special move, with a lot of unique properties. Today we’re going to talk about how to use it. We’ll talk about everything from the absolute basics to some more in-depth stuff. Let’s get into it. Basic Control Copied link! First of all, it’s very important that you input Fair with the right control stick. This gives you maximum control over your aerial drift.
